mapper.select: SELECT c.id 'classId', c.`name` 'className', COUNT(stu.id) 'peopleNum', s.id 'subjectId', s.`name` 'subjectName' FROM ddedss.teacher_subject ts INNER JOIN ddedss.lesson l ON l.teacher_subject_id = ts.id INNER JOIN ddedss.class c ON l.class_id = c.id INNER JOIN ddedss.`subject` s ON s.id = ts.subject_id LEFT JOIN ddedss.`student` stu ON stu.class_id = c.id WHERE ts.teacher_id = #{teacherId} GROUP BY stu.class_id
